title: sARDM Staking
infoWarning1: By staking ARDM tokens, they will be converted into an equal amount of sARDM tokens and placed in your wallet.
infoWarning2: Each ARDM tokens are added to the staking pool, the value of sARDM will increase.
infoWarning3: When you unstake sARDM tokens from staking, you will be awarded ARDM + (interest return) previously supplied.
infoWarning4: Your interest rate depends on the duration of your staking.
accordion1: Please be aware that this action is executed via a blockchain smart contract and is recorded permanently. Therefore, it cannot be undone
